t: Amazon Logo Decoding The Hidden Meaning, Evolution And History | Designhill
s: July 3, 2023 - The logo features some creative elements that make it look unique and appealing. The Amazon logo has a prominent arrow, which has become the brand’s visual identity. It has an arrow stretching from the letter ‘a’ and connecting the letter ‘z.’ Thus, it conveys that the e-commerce company has everything in the store for consumers. t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The Amazon logo is composed of a wordmark “Amazon” in the lowercase letters. Under the lettering there is a smooth and bold yellow arrow, coming from the letter “A” to “Z”, forming a smile. The first versions of this emblem contained the “.com” part, but it was removed after the branded started expanding its activity offline. The iconic smile-arrow symbol, created by Turner Duckworth, is playful and friendly, evoking a sense of reliability and happiness...
